markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Startling Appearance (Fleshwarp)](/Feats.aspx?ID=2519) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fleshwarp" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=338" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 92 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You are trained in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) (or another skill of your choice, if you were already trained in Intimidation) and gain the [Intimidating Glare](/Feats.aspx?ID=796) skill feat as a bonus feat.
name: Startling Appearance (Fleshwarp)

<summary>
Your appearance is enough to frighten without words.
</summary>
